name: Bulgogi
instructions: 1. Thinly slice beef and marinate in soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, garlic, and scallions. 2. Grill or pan-fry until cooked through.
about: Bulgogi is a popular Korean dish made with marinated slices of beef, cooked on a grill, and served with rice and various side dishes.

name: Galbi
instructions: 1. Marinate beef short ribs in soy sauce, sugar, garlic, sesame oil, and grated pear. 2. Grill or broil until charred and cooked through.
about: Galbi is a Korean dish of marinated and grilled beef short ribs with a sweet and savory flavor. Galbi, also known as Kalbi

name: Samgyupsal
instructions: 1. Season pork belly with salt and pepper. 2. Grill or pan-fry until crispy and cooked through.
about: Samgyupsal is a Korean dish of grilled pork belly served with various side dishes and wrapped in lettuce leaves.

name: Dak galbi
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in gochujang, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, and scallions. 2. Stir-fry with rice cakes until chicken is cooked through.
about: Dak galbi is a spicy Korean stir-fried dish made with marinated chicken and vegetables, often served with rice or noodles.

name: Banchan
instructions: 1. Prepare various vegetables such as spinach, bean sprouts, and radish. 2. Season with soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, and garlic. 3. Serve as side dishes.
about: Banchan are small, flavorful side dishes served in Korean cuisine, made with a variety of ingredients and seasoning.

name: Japchae
about: Japchae is a popular Korean dish made with sweet potato starch noodles, stir-fried with vegetables, meat, and mushrooms.
